TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IObjectAdapterWithTest implements class Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.SystemTextJson.Adapters.IObjectAdapter

Docs.summary: Defines the operations that can be performed on a JSON patch document, including "test".

MemberSignature.Value: public void Test (Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.SystemTextJson.Operations.Operation operation, object objectToApplyTo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Test(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.SystemTextJson.Operations.Operation operation, object objectToApplyTo) cil managed
Public Sub Test (operation As Operation, objectToApplyTo As Object)

Docs.param: Object to apply the operation to.
Docs.summary:
Using the "test" operation a value at the target location is compared for equality to a specified value.
The operation object MUST contain a "value" member that specifies value to be compared to the target location's value.
The target location MUST be equal to the "value" value for the operation to be considered successful.
For example: { "op": "test", "path": "/a/b/c", "value": "foo" }
See RFC 6902
